entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
